response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value and potential impact on your endeavors, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at an exceptional price of $10,000. This offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. I trust that you will find this investment worthwhile and beneficial for your organization. Should you choose to accept this offer, please let me know, and we will proceed with the transaction promptly.", "product_price": 10000}
